output_list.reason: The contract does not have any access control measures in place, allowing anyone to call the constructor and initialize the contract.
The function `cancelContract` is only accessible to the contract owner, but it does not have any access control measures to prevent unauthorized access.
The modifier `gameRunning` checks if the game is running, but it does not handle the case where the game is not running.
The modifier `gameNotRunning` checks if the game is not running, but it does not handle the case where the game is running.
